name: Red Rush | Demo
description:
The game is an endless "runner" where you control a light aircraft and you need to destroy targets randomly generated in your linear course.

The game ends when you lose health by colliding with the terrain, and the goal is to destroy as many as targets as possible (rewarding points). 

--

Aspects covered in terms of learning:

  • MVP
  • Abstract Factories
  • SOLID Principles
  • Object Pooling
